options.desc: An array of objects with value and label properties. The binary components will be created according to this array
examples: :options="[ { label: 'Option 1', value: 'op1' }, { label: 'Option 2', value: 'op2' }, { label: 'Option 3', value: 'op3' } ]"

type.desc: The type of input component to be used

keep-color.desc: Keep color when not selected/truthy too

left-label.desc: When set to true, the labels will be put on the left side
